name: Antagonizing with AI
description:
We tried to work with the AI bombs, but they really don't have any interest in working with us. Now they're falling from the sky in a relentless attack and all we can do is dodge them.

Use ASWD to move out of the way of the bombs to avoid getting hit. Good luck!

Also: Any feedback is super appreciated, this is my first time using unity in a long bit plus I didn't have a ton of time (roughly 12 hours) hence why the game is how it is. This game was made for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0. Thanks for playing my game!!!
